title: Serena Williams on Being a Modern Entrepreneur | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Serena Williams on Being a Modern Entrepreneur | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: Speaking in conversation with Imran Amed at BoF West, the tennis champion unpacks how she balances life as an athlete with entrepreneurship and motherhood.To watch Serena's and Imran's conversation at BoF West 2019 click here. Sign up for BoF’s Daily
description:
Speaking in conversation with Imran Amed at BoF West, the tennis champion unpacks how she balances life as an athlete with entrepreneurship and motherhood.

To watch Serena's and Imran's conversation at BoF West 2019 click here. 

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
